Reviews.Title: “great stay for a comfort inn”
Reviews.Author: Cathy_in_Calfornia
Reviews.Content: great staff, very accomendating. The location is good, Colorado Blvd is a busy street- you can hear the traffic... but where in LA can't you hear traffic! I've stayed here a few times, they keep the rooms clean, and they serve a typical full service breakfast, can't complain. We always stay on the first floor- no elevator and hate lugging the bags up the stairs.

Reviews.Title: “A great budget choice”
Reviews.Author: teacherandteacher
Reviews.Content: This hotel offers: Great staff Super clean rooms Very comfortable beds A clean and freshly painted bathroom (one of the lights are on a timer.... you just have to turn it to make it come on) A fridge, microwave and flat screen TV. A coffee maker and coffee and tea (the only thing that we would have liked to have seen was proper milk and cream pots instead of powdered creamer - but coffee is available in the lobby all day with proper cream and milk). Our only issue during our stay was that the WiFi refused to work with either of our phones. We were recommended to visit the lemongrass restaurant on Colorado Blvd, which was very good if you like asian cuisine. This hotel is hard to fault especially when you consider the amazing breakfast and the super friendly staff.

Reviews.Title: “Great place for the money”
Reviews.Author: Carolb9
Reviews.Content: This hotel offers exceptional value if you're visiting thePasadena, Glendale, Eagle Rock area. The rooms are consistently clean and the staff is very helpful. The hotel offers easy access to Old Town Pasadena, Glendale and Occidental College (if you have a child going to school there).

Reviews.Title: “Good room and hot bfast for your $$”
Reviews.Author: Megroche
Reviews.Content: Room was clean with good hot water. Easy to find and felt pretty secure. Real star of the show was continental/hot buffet bfast! Waffle maker - hot eggs n sausage - selection of juices and bagels - plus all the normal cold iems including hardboiled eggs. Great for me (on special diet) and prego sister. Would definitely recommend and stay there again! Do ask for second flr room away from main road. I think that helped.

Reviews.AuthorLocation: New York, New York, United States
Reviews.Title: “gail t”
Reviews.Author: Gail T
Reviews.Content: My daughter is at school 5 min. away and it is very easy to stay at this Comfort Inn. It is clean and the staff is very friendly. I also like the ease of getting breakfast there.

Reviews.Title: “We keep going back!”
Reviews.Author: Marlene E
Reviews.Content: We've stayed at this property many times over the years. The staff is always friendly and helpful. The rooms are attractive, clean and smell good. It's quiet and the price is right. There's a free breakfast which has variety and is quite good. The name speaks for itself, it truly is a comfort inn. Marlene E., Big Bear Lake, CA

Reviews.Title: “Comfort Inn in Eagle Rock,CA”
Reviews.Author: Marlene M
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a nice hotel to stay in while in Los Angeles, I would highly recommend the Comfort Inn in Eagle Rock. Staff is friendly and the rooms are very clean. They offer free hot breakfast which includes eggs, sausage, toast and bagels and belgium waffles and much more!!Check it out next time you visit Los Angeles, CA.

Reviews.Title: “great service, clean space”
Reviews.Author: PaulNovato
Reviews.Content: friendly service, clean rooms and quiet. The people that I dealt with were very friendly, and the rates for the room were very fair for the area.

Reviews.Title: “eight-day stay a-ok”
Reviews.Author: K H
Reviews.Content: Good value -- very comfortable pillows and bed, decent rooms, great tub/shower head and water pressure, friendly staff, on-the-ball for the most part. I'm a musician and work long night hours and the staff respected my daytime do-not-disturb sign (except for one or two days where the housekeeping staff parked their cart right outside my door and talked loudly to each other all morning from 7AM on. That drives me crazy. They should always assume that someone may be sleeping -- not everyone works 9 to 5... Another bummer was that my family had an expensive flower arrangement sent to me c/o the hotel -- and the staff didn't let me know this. By the time I found out three days later (my sister-in-law called to see if I had gotten my "surprise") the flowers had just been sitting at the front desk the whole time (with my name and room number attached) and were mostly wilted. Just wish they had left a note on my door or something. Dang. Would stay here again though -- like I said, good value and solidly good rooms.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value for the money”
Reviews.Author: millie5691
Reviews.Content: This is no 5 star hotel by the typical standards but for the money it sure was!! Everything you need for a "budget" traveler, we pd 89.00 a night with our AAA card.. A typical Comfort Inn except the staff was super friendly. They couldn't have been more helpful. The room was clean, the beds comfortable, no complaints. I felt very safe . The breakfast was simple, waffles; cereal, yogurt, fruit. Not much in the immediate area, but it was a short trip up the road to access the freeway, worth every penny!

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel and a great value”
Reviews.Author: Shannyraej
Reviews.Content: Rooms were comforatble and clean. Breakfast was good with some good variety. Very central location to all of the areas attractions

Reviews.Title: “We Lovedit and return any time”
Reviews.Author: GillesHD
Reviews.Content: The motel is quiet and clean, the breakfast really good, swiming pool good to, the room are clean and the bed are excellent to.

Reviews.Title: “Didn't love it”
Reviews.Author: LilMissTraveler
Reviews.Content: I'm very surprised that no one has mentioned the street noise in their reviews. Perhaps I just got unlucky on the evening that I stayed. I was only there one night, on the bottom floor, and the street noise kept me up. Also having the cars parked right in front of my room made for a distraction. I could also hear the footsteps of the room above me. The room itself was serviceable. Decent and roomy, with a desk to sit at. Bathroom was small but clean and fine. The amenities included shampoo, soap, lotion and shower cap. There was a coffee maker, fridge and microwave, plus hair dryer and iron. I didn't use the pool but they have one. They also serve breakfast, which I didn't partake in. Parking was easy and there was plenty of parking spaces. The clerk was nice enough upon check-in. I wish I had paid about $20 less than what I did. This motel would be fine for about $70/night, but really not more than that. I ended up moving motels to the Ramada Inn in East Pasadena and it was great. Lesson/tip: Ask for a second floor room, away from the street. There is a building that is facing towards the other building and that one looked more desirable.

Reviews.Title: “Good location, comfortable rooms.”
Reviews.Author: RoelR
Reviews.Content: This motel is well located to visit all of LA's attractions. We drove to Hollywood & Beverly Hills in less than 20 minutes. Checkin was good, and were pleasantly surprised by the nice, clean room. A standard motel room, but not too old. Everything was there, even refrigirator & microwave oven. The pool gave us a nice cool down after a long hot day. Large supermarkets are just minutes away, as are many restaurants and gas stations. WiFi working OK We originally came for one night, but wanted to stay another. Unfortunaly there was a footballgame on saturday, so everything was sold out. Definitely a recommendation

Reviews.Title: “great location”
Reviews.Author: ElizabethC71
Reviews.Content: great location for everything we wanted to do in LA. near Universal Studios, China Town and the LA Convention Center. First room smelled like cigarette smoke and were immediately moved to another room. Staff was friendly .

Reviews.Title: “"Choice Hotel?"... I think NOT!”
Reviews.Author: BellaFlor619
Reviews.Content: Bugs, bugs, and more bugs. That's really all I need to say about this place. We planned on staying here for a couple nights for a friends wedding and college football game we were attending that weekend. HUGE mistake thinking it was better to save on a room. Of course the decor is dated and its a Motel not Hotel. But I never expected to see strange bugs crawling all over the beds, headboards and walls. They came out approximately after being in the room only 3 hours. We quickly and carefully pack up and ran out. The staff was not helpful in finding us another hotel and couldn't refund our money right away. We ended up driving through LA in the middle of the night when we finally got to a clean and very safe Hotel. I would never take my chances again on any Comfort Inn or any of their so called "Choice Hotels".

Reviews.Title: “Very Reliable, never any surprises!”
Reviews.Author: Rober2555
Reviews.Content: This was my fifth or sixth visit over the past year; each stay has been incredibly consistent, reliable, and never any surprises. Would defintely recommend, and stay there again and again!

Reviews.Title: “Nice Property with Good Free Breakfast”
Reviews.Author: UnsatisfiedDiner
Reviews.Content: This is a nice property, not new but well maintained, on Colorado Blvd west of Old Town Pasadena. The free breakfast was good too. Front desk clerk was knowlegeable and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “I had a very pleasant experience at this hotel. They were very helpful when I told them I had forgotten my toiletries.”
Reviews.Author: Hovy
Reviews.Content: I found the hotel to be very clean and the receptionist was very helpful in providing me a toothbrush and other toiletries I had forgotten. The atmosphere was also quiet; unlike other hotels I've stayed at where there seemed to have been a lot of doors slamming. Overall, it was a great value for the price.

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel, Great Location!”
Reviews.Author: firebirdta84
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel, located right in Pasadena. This was a conveinent stopping point for me. The rooms were clean, breakfast was great and staff was friendly. I would definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: sweetjlp
Reviews.Content: We have stayed several times, it is always clean and the people are very friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Good deal”
Reviews.Author: fillzee
Reviews.Content: stayed at the comfort Inn old town for a week on a spring break trip. Overall a good value, not fancy but clean and a good location. only real drawback I found was the pillows were too small, oh well

Reviews.Title: “disappointed-no response from management”
Reviews.Author: squeezeTucson
Reviews.Content: We stay at this motel quite often since we have family in area. Always found the employees pleasant and the rooms clean. This visit we had a problem with the bathtub stopper and was told by the manager that she would discount us 20% for that night. I asked her to please confirm that by e-mail. At this writing neither has happened.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location for Jay Leno and Dr Phil Shows”
Reviews.Author: PropsRule
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this location due to the convenience to go to Jay Leno and the Dr. Phil shows. For what we paid, I thought it was a great place and it seemed to be very secure with the parking and rooms on the inside away from the street. We never heard any road noise and the rooms were clean and comfortable. The only minor complaint was that the carpeting was in need of a good cleaning or replacement. The breakfast starting at 6 AM was very convenient for a 6:30 departure to be in the Dr Phil Audience. The staff was very friendly and helpful. I would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable room with a relaxing spa.”
Reviews.Author: Catcmorgan
Reviews.Content: I visited LA recently and stayed at the Comfort Inn Near Old Town Pasadena. As a frequent traveler I rely on the quality of Choice hotels to meet my needs. This hotel was no exception. Room was clean, bed comfortable and the Spa was very relaxing. Close enough to downtown without being right in the middle. Will definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay for appointments in Eagle Rock.”
Reviews.Author: catnewman
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here, over night, on March 4, 2011 to March 5, 2011. We found our room to be clean, comfortable, very pleasantly appointed and spacious. This room looked newly renovated. We had our own private stairway entrance, so no one was walking in front of our windows, making the room very quiet. The hotel staff was very helpful with directions and accomodating our needs. This hotel is located in Eagle Rock conveniently 5 to 6 blocks from the freeway. Although the pillows were smaller than full size, I found I could stack two together for a good night's sleep. Also, the best continental breakfast items are the cereal and muffins. Although there is a 24 hour front desk, housekeeping leaves at 5:00 p.m., so get your linen changes early. Good restaurants straight down the street.

Reviews.Title: “Spic & Span,Very Pleased and Impressed.”
Reviews.Author: BlueLanternTree
Reviews.Content: I've heard good things about this hotel from family members who've been repeat visitors. I live in Southern California but needed to stay in the Los Angeles area for some weekend plans. The courteous, pleasant check- in experience, the sparkling clean, inviting accommodations, and the fantastic breakfast all made for an exceptionally relaxing and rewarding stay. There appears to be a lot of thought and care and attention to detail (little bits of creativity showed that said to me that much thought was put into how to make the guest experience be the best possible) and just an overall high standard in their managemen tof this hotel. I was highly appreciative of the overall stay. The hotel location, layout, and room details were all very convenient in nature. Give high marks all around! A great stay.

Reviews.Title: “It is that good”
Reviews.Author: OpaJon
Reviews.Content: Thei si the 4th times we have stayed at Comfort Inn in the last year and we will stay again on all of our visits to the area. We visit our grandkids and it is located close to their home and great paces to eat are within walking distance.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, well maintained, & centrally located”
Reviews.Author: srevans
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here several times now in the last two years & find the staff very friendly & helpful to do their best to meet our needs. Very good location for business & easy to reach theme parks & points of interest in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Spacious room, well maintained, helpful staff.”
Reviews.Author: krademacher33
Reviews.Content: This motel is on a fairly busy street, yet the building sort of wraps around a partly enclosed parking area, which shields it nicely enough. Room was spacious and well maintained. Although the "guest common area" with computer with printer was closed while being remodeled and updated, staff were quite helpful and cheerful about providing a laptop and printer at the counter so we could confirm our flights. Very nice restaurants were available nearby in downtown Pasadena.

Reviews.Title: “Good value, good effort”
Reviews.Author: AndyCatChilliwack
Reviews.Content: I believe the motel itself is an older one, but every has been spent in keeping it up. It was quiet and comfortable, and we were greeted with a little gift package of chocolate bars when we checked in. We'd picked it because it was about half an hour from Hollywood, where we'd spent the day at Universal Studios and Musso and Frank's wonderful restaurant, and well placed for our trip east the next day. The "expanded" continental breakfast was lovely.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent, friendly. polite and courteous staff in the office, in the parking lot and cleanliness of rooms.”
Reviews.Author: tarun_11
Reviews.Content: The staff spoke good English and were full of smiles. The breakfast could hardly be described as "continental". It was healthy and filling while served in an environment that was cleaned daily.

Reviews.Title: “Staff's knowledge of area the best”
Reviews.Author: Bermudaspirit
Reviews.Content: Arrived for Parade of Roses. Hotel sponsored a get acquainted get together to learn the ins & outs of the best of the Parade extravaganza. We used the day prior to parade to test suggested travel routes. Chose their recommendation to use the Metro & within 25 minutes of leaving the hotel we were in our seats on the parade route. Their knowledge of Eagle Rock area saved us tremendous time when looking for places to eat and shop. Our best find was Armando's restaurant for lunch withen a few blocks. The room was comfortable although they could use a little refurbishing, which I believe is in the making as I write this review. Thank you to the Staff at Comfort Inn, Eagle Rock, CA for making this an enjoyable trip despite the cold weather.

Reviews.Title: “Reasonably priced for what you get.”
Reviews.Author: ms1candy
Reviews.Content: Nice location, friendly staff, decent rooms all made for a pleasant stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great room, great price!”
Reviews.Author: phattygirl221
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect place when you need a home away from home. Friendly staff, large rooms, comfortable beds and on site guest laundry. I always enjoy my stay.

Reviews.Title: “very good and pleasant stay”
Reviews.Author: don4q
Reviews.Content: The recent renovation provided an added cleanness of the rooms. It was very comfort and quite.

Reviews.Title: “OK stay”
Reviews.Author: greg33319
Reviews.Content: My stay was Ok. Not the most updated room furnishings but was clean.

Reviews.Title: “Busy street and not much to look at, but comfortable accomadations.”
Reviews.Author: dkrobtravel
Reviews.Content: we were a bit apprehensive when we arrived and looked on the outside. It is set in amongst many businesses on a busy boulevard. To our delight the room was clean and comfortable. The breakfast area in the lobby was very small, but worked O.K. We got a good night's sleep without hearing any traffic noise, so we were pleased. Thought it was closer to Old Town Pasadena, but worked for driving.

Reviews.Title: “the hotel was exactly what we were looking for”
Reviews.Author: MDomingo
Reviews.Content: The rooms were a good size, nice and very clean. We liked the location, and the friendly staff. The free coffee/tea all day was also great!

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable stay / close to freeways”
Reviews.Author: CaAz-JT
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here many times in the past and will continue to book reservations here. The accommodations are very comfortable and convenient. Rooms have plenty of space, the breakfast in the morning is fresh, and the location is perfect for us (close enough to the freeway and other locations). No complaints at all this trip, a highly recommended location if you are going to be in the Burbank, Glendale, or Pasadena area.

Reviews.Title: “Right around the corner from where I need to be”
Reviews.Author: Steverino39
Reviews.Content: Near enough to the freeway to be accomodating, far enough to have no noise. The hot tub was wonderful and my bed had 4 pillows! Grabbed a coffee, juice, 2 muffins, and 2 yogurts on the way to my morning meeting.

Reviews.Title: “A Pleasant, Pleasant Stay @ a Perfect, Perfect, Perfect Location.”
Reviews.Author: Trippendicular
Reviews.Content: This Comfort location's harbored-style, drive-up motel was perfect for our packed SUV; the parking space located directly in front of our room door allowed us to unpack our personal items & carry our bags into our room with relieving ease. The ice machine was located just down the walkway, in a covered, concession machine corner, and operated with e-z insert of our room card-key. The hotel-structure itself shielded our row of rooms from Colorado street by the hotel's wrap-around harbor design; it all made for a very cozy stay! and in a completely safe & comfortable setting. The Wal-Greens & CVS Drug Stores were just a block-walk away, and surrounded by plenty of sidewalk eateries and village-like sandwich shops. Even more: There's a public computer lab located along Colorado Street, in the "village;" The lab is frequented by local 'gamers,' but it's open to any patron who is willing to pay $10 for the first 3 ours, then $2 per hour thereafter. color-printed copies are available for .25 cents, and retrievable from the young attendant behind the help-desk. Finally, by the end of our stay, we simply did not want to leave this cozy, cute little hotel; and same can be said for the charming, quaint sidewalk "village" of Eagle Rock. We loved our stay in this lovely residential area and we would recommend this Choice Privileges location to any Quality cardholders. We recommend a walk along the beautiful, tree-lined neighborhood just off the main drag of Colorado street for a glimpse of the most beautiful California cottage-homes from Yesteryear. It all is very charming & very intoxicating.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient and economical place to stay”
Reviews.Author: artjeweler
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this motel numerous times over the last two or three years and have found the personnel, premesis, and accommodations to be the best in the area not to mention very economical. It is very clean and I have always been met with a smile when checking in. I find this motel the be very convenient as it is close enough to the freeway that you can go to any tourist location in the LA area but not too close where you have to listen to the freeway noise.

Reviews.Title: “We will stay again and again - it is that nice.”
Reviews.Author: OpaJon
Reviews.Content: We have stayed 2 times at this hotel and we have been very pleased witht the service, cleanliness and the breakfast area is well supplied and very fresh. Well qualified staff. It was full both times but very quiet even though it is right on Colorado Ave. Great coffee shop a block away.

Reviews.Title: “Won't stay here again”
Reviews.Author: INEEDAGOODNIGHTSREST
Reviews.Content: We used a very large hotel book that rated this hotel with 3 Diamonds or Stars. 1 star is is not the best, on up to 5 Stars is fantastic. This hotel was rated with 3 Stars and was reasonably priced for our budget so we booked three nights. The photos on line look great, really super, makes the place look brand new, (which it is not). Photos show giant rooms, (there were some that size in the photos), again, in the photos, everything is new looking, perfect, wonderful, a real paradise. Well some of those large room photos appear to be a couple of the remodeled rooms but still with the old furniture. While we were there, they were remodeling some other rooms. However, we had one of the old smaller rooms, not yet remodeled. In the case of the expression, "A picture is worth a thousand words", it does not hold true here. Our room was very small. The pictures on line make this place look like paradise and that we will tell you it is not. We were so disappointed when we arrived late in the evening and went to our room. Lets just go through our disappointment item by item: Clerk did fine checking us in, gave us an extra discount for a coupon we had picked up while on the road. As noted, the room was very small with very old, dated furniture. After we checked out, I took a few moments and looked at a larger, remodeled room, which just looked like fresh paint with the same old furniture and they had done some bathroom work. In our "old room" there was a table and two chairs, again, the funiture in the remodeled rooms looked the same as our, old but it may have been new and they just got the same ugly furniture style for the remodeled rooms. In our room, the chair seats cushions were so badly stained that we wouldn't sit on them. Many different large and small ugly stains all over them and the wood chair arms were sticky to the touch. Refrigerator had to be un-plugged because it was so loud when it came on. Tub, sink, toilet appeared clean but with the chairs experience and the feel of the carpeting as you walked on it with all its stains, we didn't know for sure how sink, etc were. By the way, the bathroom with tub and toilet is so small that you can use both at the same time. Do the vacuums they use in hotels have attachments??? All along the walls where carpeting meets the walls, about an inch out from the walls there was dirt, dust and crumbs in that groove and out as much as an inch out. It was indicated that they had new matresses which we saw had full matress covers on them so the new matresses seemed true, however, they were hard as rocks. It was like sleeping on a piece of plywood, no give at all and I'm over 225 lbs. Beds also had strange smaller, what we would call half pillows, so if you want to stay here, you may want to bring your own pillows, if you are comfortable putting them on these beds. Hotel is next to main street but we will say it was quiet in that respect, only one of the couple of pluses we could give this place. Lots of noise in the parking lot from the neighbors. Breakfast area is so small and tight to move in that is it really un-comfortable to eat at with 3 or 4 people in the area. We were so un-comfortable at the place that we checked out after one night and went else where for our other two nights in the area. We would not of rated this place with any stars at this time. If the hotel were to send a free night stay or even a weeks free stay because of our disapointment with our stay, we wouldn't use it or pass it on. We moved onto a Holiday Inn for $20 more a night, which was well worth it.

Reviews.Title: “Motel was near attractions and the staff was helpful.”
Reviews.Author: vacation1224
Reviews.Content: Hotel was clean and affordable. it was near a few of the attractions that we wanted to see and the location was perfect for us.

Reviews.Title: “Nice quite room”
Reviews.Author: Muralman
Reviews.Content: Room king room was large with desk, table, refrigerator& microwave. Breakfast was better than expected. No elevator to second floor. Will stay here again when in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Would stay here again”
Reviews.Author: jonfujita
Reviews.Content: Convenient to Occidental College and freeways Breakfast just okay has washing facilities, outdoor pool and parking nearby restaurants are good

Reviews.Title: “Old Town Pasadena”
Reviews.Author: handgunner
Reviews.Content: This was an extraordinary deal for a great little hotel. I was able to conduct business all week and complete the needed documentation in the evening thanks to a great wireless signal. The beds were exceptional and I do not usually sleep well in hotels. I was able to not only sleep comfortably, but even sneaked in a nap or two as well. I have to say the breakfast was great but I was expecting something other than just a continental breakfast with waffles given the online description.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient”
Reviews.Author: ReverendIke
Reviews.Content: I've stayed at this location before. It has quick access to two freeways which is the main key. The freeways quickly lead to downtown LA or to Hollywood not to mention the Santa Anita race track. Pasadena is also quickly arrived at.

Reviews.Title: “Still a 2 Star Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Sadeek
Reviews.Content: No matter what people say, it is still a 2 star hotel and it feels like that. Noise is a major factor, from the road, rooms overhead, staircase and rolling suitcases on the upstairs walkway all sound like a herd of elephants going by. The rooms are dingy with outdated furniture and linens. The towels are paper thin as are the sheets and there were holes in the sheets. The breakfast area was too crowded and not enough tables for people to sit at The place made me wrinkle my nose every time we walked in the room.

Reviews.Title: “Very pleasant stay.”
Reviews.Author: love_myrtle_beach
Reviews.Content: Room was clean, spacious and offered everything we needed. Location was excellent. Staff was friendly, helpful. Breakfast was very nice.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly helpful service close to a lot of facilities.”
Reviews.Author: wadders190
Reviews.Content: Didn't book via internet just went in and requested a room, very friendly and helpful staff. Two floors of rooms but no elevator (That was our only disappointment). Room very neat and clean and good internet access. Continental Breakfast included in price very good but no hard boiled eggs like some of the other Quality Inns.

Reviews.Title: “Good value”
Reviews.Author: dlpf
Reviews.Content: This hotel is very convenient to Glendale/EagleRock/Pasadena, and is a very good deal for the price. There are two excellent coffee shops a short walk away, plus restaurants, drug store and shops. I've stayed there twice. The rooms are kept clean and have all the expected amenities, plus there's a complementary breakfast that's more than just coffee and a pastry.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable, convenient & good value”
Reviews.Author: NickyOm
Reviews.Content: This motel is very convenient to Occidental College where we were visiting. I was impressed with the cleanliness of our room and the pleasing decor and colors. Also the refrigerator (which we did use) was of a quite decent size for a mini-fridge and in addition there was a microwave oven - which was a surprise as I had not found this mentioned in the list of amenities. There was also a coffee maker, iron & board and in-room safe. The shower/tub was very clean with plentiful hot water and good water pressure. Towels were average. The beds and pillows were comfortable (on the firm side which we prefer). The air conditioner was not on when we came in (and our visit was during a heat wave) but the room cooled down very quickly. TV worked fine. We were in the back corner, second floor and did not hear much noise. Stayed here for just one night so did not make use of the pool, business center or the free high speed internet, so can't comment on any of that, nor on the front desk service which was straight-forward check-in and check-out. I walked a block away to a Walgreens and also noticed there was a Starbucks, Cold Stone Creamery and some other stores there. The free continental breakfast was OK. Nothing special except the fresh waffles were very nice - tender crisp and fluffy. The fruit was disappointing - seems to be a common problem with motel continental breakfasts. Mushy apples - blech; but at least there were OK bananas. The L-shaped setup in a corner makes it a little difficult to maneuver around when there is a crowd of people. But overall, an adequate breakfast. I would definitely return to this Comfort Inn if I needed a place in Eagle Rock or close by because it really is good value.

Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay,particularly if one is disabled . Staff is very attentive.”
Reviews.Author: rollinoffnon
Reviews.Content: Locating a hotel with the needed accommodations for one who "rolls" instead of walks can have interesting results. The staff knows that a roll in shower is one without a tub.Extra bath towels are there for the asking. The room was large, clean and well kept. An encouraging the greening of the planet is a definite must for us.

Reviews.Title: “The reason why I keep on coming back.”
Reviews.Author: bechie
Reviews.Content: Everytime I have to go to this side of LA, regardless if it's business or leisure, I make it a point to stay at this hotel. I feel so secured leaving my vehicle outside and some of my belongings in the room. And the staff are just so friendly and professional, with the special mention of the awesome complimentary breakfast. I have been a repeat customer for more than 5 years now and I still keep on coming back, it's my home away from home.

Reviews.Title: “Great value near Occidential College”
Reviews.Author: cathypaul14
Reviews.Content: good, confortable, and clean rooms at a reasonable price. Colorado can be noisy, but you can turn on the A/C if you need to close the windows. No gym, but free access to World Gym nearby (great facilities).

Reviews.Title: “Great choice in Eagle Rock / Glendale areas”
Reviews.Author: ChefGL1
Reviews.Content: I booked a ten-night stay here on line with no asistance. The property is easy to find, comfortable, and in a great area near all types of restaurants. There was extremely good wireless internet connection which is a necessity for me personally. I stay more than fifty nights each year in hotels and motels , mostly in CHIOICE hotel properties. This was one of the better overall experiences I've had in four years of extensive travel. I didn't try the outdoor pool, but it looked great as did the daily breakfast. The staff were all very pleasant and friendly... all services were great. I can honestly recommend this for business or vacation travel.

Reviews.Title: “A great stay for a good price”
Reviews.Author: tremble67
Reviews.Content: The room was very clean and roomy. The air conditioning worked great during the heat wave of 100+ degrees. Hotel is about 3 miles away from a mall with many eating option such as Olive Garden, Cheesecake Factory, etc.

Reviews.Title: “the perfect motel to stay for a trip to LA”
Reviews.Author: Jefselke
Reviews.Content: On our honeymoon we stayed in this motel to visit LA and the surrounding area. This was a good base to go check out LA, Hollywood and several beaches, everying was a 15 to 30 minutes drive from the motel. We really enjoyed the outdoor jacuzzi. On walkingdistance there are several good restaurants (do not forget to go to Lemongrass at 1952 Colorado Blvd, taste yummy!) The motel was not too expensive and the staff was very helpful for example to arrange tickets for Universal studios.

Reviews.Title: “Very pleasant and enjoyable stay. Great location for visiting Hollywood!”
Reviews.Author: loocg
Reviews.Content: Our family with two young children stayed here recently with the intention of visiting Universal Studios and the Hollywood area. The renovated room was comfortable and the inroom refrigerator came in handy. We also appreciated the free WiFi connection. Complimentary breakfast included, waffles, muffins, pastries, mini bagels, cereal and assorted fruits...great start to our funfilled day. Shortly after we checked in, the friendly lady from the front desk called our room to ensure that everything was to our satisfaction. I thought that was a nice touch plus the little box of chocolates were well appreciated. The hotel is only about 10-15 minutes away from Universal Studios and there is easy freeway access. Old Pasadena (about a 5 minute drive) was wonderful with shops and restaurants. We also visited the Griffith Observatory which was not too far away either. Thank you Rocio for your amazing service! We would definitely stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “Will never come back!”
Reviews.Author: Moodi_Ali
Reviews.Content: The location of this hotel is very far from old town ,and many major attractions ,the air condition makes the room either very hot or very cold. I was surprised with hidden fees that i was not aware of from the beginning. one receptionist have a very bad attitude and was not helping at all ,will surely avoid this hotel in the future.

Reviews.Title: “A great hotel in a quiet neighborhood.”
Reviews.Author: P0PC0RN_10
Reviews.Content: We stayed here because it was close enough to Universial Studios, Hollywood and the Beach. If you dont mind driving a little you can't beat the price! The room was clean, quiet and comfortable. Our children loved the free breakfast, who doesn't love waffles! The grounds were well kept and the pool and spa were sparkling. The staff was very helpful and friendly. The neighborhood was well established and clean with a Target shopping center close by. We went to a Farmers Market on Sunday and visited the local establishments many times. The Taco Spot down the street has the best carne asade I ever ate.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel to stay”
Reviews.Author: abq_traveler110
Reviews.Content: I had a great time there. The hotel is comfortable and clean. It is in a very good location and prety close to different points of interest.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay ... good location for our MLB trip.”
Reviews.Author: JJG7797
Reviews.Content: The staff made the difference ... very friendly, knowledgable and well trained. We thorougly enjoyed our stay.

Reviews.Title: “Our favorite LA spot to stay”
Reviews.Author: doreenmark
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at the Eagle Rock Comfort Inn several times. The girls at the front desk are always friendly when we check in or out and are eager to offer directions to restaurants and events nearby. We usually stay here when we have tickets to the LA Dodgers, as the stadium is just minutes away. The rooms are always clean and the staff is always available to make sure things are as they should be. We will come back again and again.

Reviews.Title: “comfortable an convenient”
Reviews.Author: bbaldwin34
Reviews.Content: The service was very friendly and helpful. The room was large and clean. The bed was comfortable but pillows were not that great. Wish I had brought my own pillows. We enjoyed the breakfast bar in the morning. There were lots to choose from and everything was fresh. We would definitely stay in a Comfort Inn again

Reviews.Title: “They upgraded me for free!!”
Reviews.Author: JacksonDanielBray
Reviews.Content: Recently I have been traveling to LA frequently to work on my film, "Mamitas" staring E.J. Bonilla and Jennifer Esposito. When I do, I always enjoy staying at the Comfort Inn near old town Pasadena. The staff is fantastic, the amenities are great and the rooms are quality. The last time I stayed, because they did not have the queen bed I requested, they upgraded me to a king room for free. As a Choice Rewards Elite Diamond member I've stayed a lot of places and I can definitely recommend this hotel to you when traveling to LA. For the money, it's a great deal. As a recommendation, use the business rate or Sam's club rate when reserving your stay here. This will save you some extra $$$.

Reviews.Title: “Didn't sleep much....”
Reviews.Author: ethancrockett
Reviews.Content: I arrived around 9pm, greeted by the concierge. No problem getting checked in or finding the room. I was woken at least 4 times by car alarms, not to mention a couple times by emergency vehicles throughout the night. Beds were a little firm for my liking. Overall...could have been a lot better. Not quite as good looking as online photos.

Reviews.Title: “Comfort and convenience”
Reviews.Author: jrsjrs
Reviews.Content: Our room was clean and comfortable,t he breakfast just enough to get us off to a good start, and the hotel was convenient to several places we wished to go (Occidental, Pasadena).

Reviews.Title: “average”
Reviews.Author: orsonwells
Reviews.Content: stayed for the bonus points and location close to client

Reviews.Title: “Clean, spacious rooms, good value for money”
Reviews.Author: Carasson
Reviews.Content: Liked this place, rooms were spacious and clean. Refrigerator in rooms were good. Good location if you are here with car. Free parking. We came to visit LA and Hollywood, and it was a good area, approx 10-15 min (with no traffic) from the city centre of LA. Breakfast was ok. Had a nice pool, but was located quite near the road, and we could hear it from pool. Good value for money. Facilties for washing clothes.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, quiet, good locations, great price!”
Reviews.Author: nancymoran
Reviews.Content: This is a well maintained, older property, with spacious rooms and nice pool. Enjoyed having room safe as well as refrigerator. Staff was very accommodating and friendly. Was a good location for our visit with friends, as well as shopping and taking in the sights. Very good value for the money. Would definitely stay there again when in Pasadena area.

Reviews.Title: “What a nice play to stay for a night”
Reviews.Author: gdbalocal
Reviews.Content: The room was spacious and very comfortable. The TV was large and very clear with many cable offerings. I asked for second floor and received it even though I checked in rather late in the night. It was very quiet.

Reviews.Title: “Conveniently located and a great value”
Reviews.Author: swymer
Reviews.Content: Great service, a couple of miles from downtown Pasadena, close to (walking distance) many stores and shops.

Reviews.Title: “The room i stayed in smells. It smell...”
Reviews.Author: Roncruz28
Reviews.Content: The room i stayed in smells. It smell like a wet dog.

Reviews.Title: “Very Helpful and Reliable”
Reviews.Author: braintrain
Reviews.Content: The staff was very helpful. I sent several boxes to hold for a show that I was attending and they all were stored securely. Room was very clean and spacious. Price was right, too. Good location from Pasadena Convention center. Location was secure and quiet, even though off a main street. Try the Spitz local eatery down the street for some unusual food. I was a happy customer and would recommend this motel to the budget traveler.

Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: speed31
Reviews.Content: We selected the motel because of its proximity to Harvest Rock Church in Pasadena where we attended a conference. The room was clean and quiet (except for some 3 a.m. arrivals in the room above us!) The bed was comfortable and everything worked! (heater, refrigerator, etc) The breakfast was good with waffles, cereal, rolls and fruit. The staff was courteous and helpful. We will be back!

Reviews.Title: “Good location, good price, I'll be back”
Reviews.Author: steel202
Reviews.Content: Nice and friendly. Good breakfast, easy booking and checkout.

Reviews.Title: “reliable and reasonably priced accommodation”
Reviews.Author: Oxymom
Reviews.Content: This motel is situated very near Occidental College, where my daughter attends college, so that is my primary reason for staying there. (The motel offers an Oxy discount.) I wish that the motel would become completely smoke-free, as smoke from "smoking" rooms inevitably finds its way into the ventilation system. I very much appreciate the mini-refrigerator, and while the wireless internet connection is weak, it is free. The barely passable contents of the "continental breakfast" and the very narrow time frame to acquire it - 7am to 9am - do not make eating breakfast there an appealing venture. All said, though, the quality is very reliable in its averageness, and the room pricing is fair for the accommodation.

Reviews.Title: “The booking and check in was quicl and easy.”
Reviews.Author: gooche
Reviews.Content: Room was ready and we were told about continental breakfast and internet service on checo-in.

Reviews.Title: “Quality service”
Reviews.Author: Beckertz
Reviews.Content: Clean and well-maintained motel. Breakfast good. Good location for our purposes.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Johynnyrovno
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this Comfort Inn on my way back from Simi Valley and as always it was great! I had no idea about what neighborhood I was getting ready to stay at here, but I was pleasantly surprised. Clean rooms, great staff and breakfast! Thanks guys!

Reviews.Title: “Close to Where I Needed to Be”
Reviews.Author: JokeTeller
Reviews.Content: This being my second time staying there I can say that the service and staff are great. The room had everything I needed and comfortable. The location was perfect for where I needed to be and while I didn't use the pool it looked clean and well maintained. I will always make my reservations there whenever I come back to the area.

Reviews.Title: “Spring break”
Reviews.Author: ReverendIke
Reviews.Content: The comfort inn was accessible to all my needs. It had the access to the freeways and places I need to be.

Reviews.Title: “Really clean”
Reviews.Author: jerrysacramento
Reviews.Content: I put this on my favorites , clean and friendly, i will be back again , i travel a lot and i know a good hotel and this is a good one

Reviews.Title: “Very Good Quality and Location”
Reviews.Author: MisterDeluxe
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel along with 2 business colleagues for a trade show we were doing at the L.A. Convention Center. All of our rooms were spacious and comfortable and included refrigerators, safes and excellent internet connections. This location included a laundry room, plenty of safe parking and good air conditioners in our rooms. They take pride in keeping the place clean and the breakfast area was kept well stocked and clean during peak eating times. We will stay here again for future conventions because of its proximity to Downtown L.A. and many excellent restaurants are within 5 minutes driving distance. The pool and jacuzzi were also kept very clean and in working order.

Reviews.Title: “great stay, excellent service”
Reviews.Author: Mickhail
Reviews.Content: Excellent stay. Very private, which is exaclty what I was looking for. Staff was very professional and eager to please. I only stayed one night, but slept peacefully and do not have any complaints at all! Close to downtown Glendale (great nightlife) and oldtown Pasadena (great shopping and nightlife). Definitely recomend to a friend.

Reviews.Title: “great night to stay”
Reviews.Author: messiahjake
Reviews.Content: the place is descent, comfortable, quiet... its a nice place to relax for the night... the staff are friendly and has knowledge of the place...

Reviews.Title: “Very nice stay, very accommodating and pleasant staff.”
Reviews.Author: TheBadlander
Reviews.Content: Clean room booked a queen size, room was upgraded to a king at no additional cost. Comfortable bed and quiet. Close to the Rose Bowl where we wanted to go.

Reviews.Title: “Simple hotel with nice amenities”
Reviews.Author: Desert_Green
Reviews.Content: Hotel is in convenient location in Eagle Rock, easy access to freeway system. Physically plain building right on Colorado Blvd, but pleasant staff and clean rooms and with easy distance to shopping and restaurants. Beds are comfortable, facilities relatively well kept and clean. Decent continental breakfast, and 24 Hour Fitness pass make it worthwhile for a no frills comfortable stay.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent experience for the price!”
Reviews.Author: bizness101
Reviews.Content: I like the cleanliness and the easy check in / out.

Reviews.Title: “We'll be back!”
Reviews.Author: whoamomma
Reviews.Content: The rates where great! The staff was very friendly and helpful. The room was very clean and roomy with comfortable beds.They offer a very nice continental breakfast. This hotel was close to Occidental College which we were visiting. If our daughter decides to attend Oxy this hotel will be where we will stay when visiting her!

Reviews.Title: “Grateful to their accomodating attititude”
Reviews.Author: keithwk
Reviews.Content: As I travel the Country in an electric car, I experience difficulty finding a hotel that will allow me to plug im y electric car. The staff was great helping me with this!

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Close and Convient!”
Reviews.Author: znowzkier
Reviews.Content: Check in was effortless, no lines so that made it easy. Room was clean and out of the way of traffic and noise. Linens were clean and bed was comfortable, could be better but overall I'm use to my bed at home. Space for my laptop and electrical plugs were available. Towels could have been better, but just stayed for one night and all was pretty much in order.

Reviews.Title: “Comfort Inn is a good value.”
Reviews.Author: jkop2010
Reviews.Content: The reception staff was pleasant. Our room was clean and well maintained. The location was reasonably close to the person we were visiting. We like the fact that Comfort Inns provide a complimentary breakfast. The breakfast at this establishment was okay, but other Comfort Inns have better breakfasts with more to choose from.

Reviews.Title: “The most enjoyable stay at a hotel.”
Reviews.Author: differences23
Reviews.Content: My overall stay at the Comfort Inn was very enjoyable. The staff was courteous and overall helpful in every way. The room was immaculate and had everything I needed. The location of this hotel was conveniently located to many restaurants and shops which made the stay more enjoyable. I honestly can't say one bad thing about this hotel and I can't wait to stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Comfort at the Comfort Inn”
Reviews.Author: JazzinToronto
Reviews.Content: Very comfortable room. I appreciated the amenities such as iron and fridge. Great breakfast too! The complimentary USA Today newspaper at the door each morning was a nice touch.

Reviews.Title: “Business trip to Glendale”
Reviews.Author: polstovf
Reviews.Content: Thanks for the room and the service. It was good. The 24 Hour Fitness add-on is a great idea. The parking inside the property is a good security for the vehicles. Breakfast was fantastic!! Thank you!!!

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed our stay”
Reviews.Author: deeceecee
Reviews.Content: The staff was friendly and very helpful. The room was clean and pleasant. The location was excellent, close to where we were going, restaurants were near enough. And the scenery of the nearby foothills was beautiful.

Reviews.Title: “Great location and good breakfast. Our room was clean and updated. All the employees are very friendly.”
Reviews.Author: cpsu
Reviews.Content: Very close to Pasaden and reasonable price. Easy walk to good food!

Reviews.Title: “this hotel was perfect!!!”
Reviews.Author: ellylovesflaks
Reviews.Content: I do very much recommend this hotel to everyone and anyone who needs a nice place to stay for a good affordable price.

Reviews.Title: “Average hotel, nice staff, no frills, no real complaints”
Reviews.Author: jenncatty
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for one night and while I thought the area seemed a bit scary at night as I saw some shady looking people, I didn't have any troubles. The staff was friendly and the room was clean. I think the rooms might be due for some updating soon, but it was comfortable enough to sleep in for the night. I have no real complaints... not fancy, but it works.

Reviews.Title: “I was disappointed by this hotel: it needs a facelift.”
Reviews.Author: NOVA-HappyTraveler
Reviews.Content: I thought it would be easy to find this location but it was much more difficult than I imagined. The room was quiet. The tempurature control was terrible. The television worked but the satellite (cable) signal was intermitent. The first morning I went for continental breakfast, there was hair on my apple danish. This could be a very nice hotel with a renovations and a littel more attention to quality and appearance. I woudl not recommend this comfort inn to others in its current condition.

Reviews.Title: “This is a nice, comfortable, and convenient place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: veteranmotelvisitor
Reviews.Content: I discovered this Comfort Inn about five years ago. What attracted me was its location. It's near the confluence of two freeways: the 2 and the 134. The 2 will take you to the 5 or to downtown L.A. The 134 can take you to the San Fernando Valley or to Pasadena and beyond. Going west on Colorado will take you to the Galleria shopping center in Glendale; going east you'll soon be in Old Town Pasadena. Going east will also take you to the Rose Bowl and the annual Rose Parade. The rooms are of good size. The beds are comfortable. There are refrigerators, ironing boards, irons, and internet connections. The rooms are well maintained. There is ample parking. There's cable tv. There is some noise from the traffic on Colorado, but that's par for the course when traveling. I once had a problem with a clogged toilet. A member of the staff tried to relieve it. When he failed, they immediately put me in another room. In my experience they look after their guests.

Reviews.Title: “Good, clean and safe”
Reviews.Author: gcliff
Reviews.Content: I would like to see a discount for staying at least 1 night a week. This is a good place to stay, even tho cheaper places are in Eagle Rock. Best in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Feels Very Comfortable”
Reviews.Author: maxfield50
Reviews.Content: I love this location, I stay here from time to time. The staff was very friendly and helpful, rooms are always clean. I thought I was going to need some office help and the staff was willing. Turns out I didn't need it, but it's great that they offered. I wish the hot tub and pool were both warmer, but all in all a great place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Good Deal”
Reviews.Author: LargeAl
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a clean place to sleep I highly recommend the Comfort Inn on Colorado Blvd. It is located close to Glendale, Burbank, Hollywood, Downtown LA. The room was spacious and the service people i dealt with her most helpful and courteous. The only drawback is the neighborhood which turns a bit rough after dark, but that is something that didn't bother me as I was just using the room for a place to shower and sleep.

Reviews.Title: “Always a positive experience”
Reviews.Author: RANGALOO
Reviews.Content: We've stayed at many Comfort Inns and Suites - this is one of the nicest. We just needed a room for a week while we visited our new granddaughter. It was a convenient location, easy to get to, lots of resturants and shopping around. The staff was very friendly and helpful. We appreciated the maps of area businesses, the well-attended breakfast area with fresh food and the courtyard parking. The rooms were very clean and well laid out. Good value.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, close to shopping at Galleria Mall-Glendale”
Reviews.Author: hjbtrip
Reviews.Content: The front staff was excellent, accomodating and very pleasant.

Reviews.Title: “Business”
Reviews.Author: Shadito
Reviews.Content: I was in the area for business for a few days this hotel served purpose. Location was ideal and staff was were great. Rooms were clean and beds were good. As I spend more than half the year in hotels I am picky but conservative and this fits the bill

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: jessiehot9
Reviews.Content: Everything was clean...friendly...helpful...this is my favorite hotel to stay in when im in la

Reviews.Title: “Consistantly good quality and good service”
Reviews.Author: Tranquilltom
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at the Comfort Inn several tomes thi past year for one to four night visits to Los Angeles. I have always found the rooms to be clean and the facilities well kept. The staff is always polite, friendly and helpful. While a little more expensive than some nearby motels, this is easily offset by the complimentary breakfast. Especially for couples and families.

Reviews.Title: “My stay at the Comfort Inn”
Reviews.Author: jeepgal55
Reviews.Content: The staff was very friendly and helpful. The room was very clean and enjoyed having HBO. The Comfort Inn near old town is very convenient to the 134 and 2 freeway. I have a very enjoyable stay.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice experience”
Reviews.Author: softail49
Reviews.Content: Very nice place. Breakfast a definite plus. New bedding really made a difference.

Reviews.Title: “Great location for Rose Bowl game and parade”
Reviews.Author: ocsurvivor
Reviews.Content: On arrival this motel appeared rather dismal. We had a handicapped room (it must have been the only thing available when I booked). Although the unit was clean, the carpet was very old and appeared dirty and worn. I felt that they took advantage of the Rose Bowl and Parade by making minimum stay of 3 nights and nearly tripled the price of the room. We did not use the third night and since we had two rooms this was quite an additional expense. I must say they did go out of their way to provide very good information about the parade, transportation, restaurants, etc. All in all, we were happy to be close to the venues and were in our rooms very little.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: BuckeyeWill
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I stayed at the "Comfort Inn Near Old Town Pasadena" when we went to the Rose Bowl. To be honest I wasn't sure what to expect considering that the rates were pretty low in comparison to some of the other hotels in the area but I have to say that this hotel was pretty nice. The rooms were clean, the staff were AWESOME and this hotel was located near everything that we were interested in seeing: Rose Bowl - 4 miles, Universal Studios - about 20 minutes and Hollywood Blvd - about 30 minutes. I would have no problem in staying at this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Overpriced for the accomodations”
Reviews.Author: CriticalTravelR
Reviews.Content: The room was below average for the price paid. It was listed as "near Old Towne Pasadena" but was over 5 miles away. If it is listed as "near" one would assume you could be within walking distance. Eagle Rock is in the city of Los Angeles, it isn't in Pasadena yet I was paying Pasadena prices for a substandard room. There was hair on the walls of the bathroom and a door with a poorly repaired hole. The main street that fronted on the hotel was pretty noisy. The best thing was there was a Starbuck's within walking distance.

Reviews.Title: “Great location and value.”
Reviews.Author: thomasinaSeattle
Reviews.Content: Nice location in Eagle Rock. We stay here 3 -4 times a year when visiting family. Hotel staff is very friendly, rooms a neat and the breakfast is a nice extra.

Reviews.Title: “Everything we expected from a Comfort Inn”
Reviews.Author: madtowner
Reviews.Content: We frequently use Comfort Inn when traveling. This location was exactly what we expected. The rooms were clean and in good condition. The vanity and tub appeared to be new. We'll use this location again on our next visit.

Reviews.Title: “christmas”
Reviews.Author: Alejandro32
Reviews.Content: It was a very good stay. All the acomodation were in perfect shape and no had no issues with the service

Reviews.Title: “the room was very clean and service was excellent”
Reviews.Author: skyladog
Reviews.Content: The hotel was very nice and convenient. When I needed to have my coffee carafe replaced, the staff did that immediately.

Reviews.Title: “not room paid for,over priced,dirty,felt unsafe,noisie,sofa bed sunk in”
Reviews.Author: peachesafternoon
Reviews.Content: we stayed x-mas eve and x-mas night what a horrible room, first off we got a room for hubbie and my self then his sister was going to be alone so decided to take her with, called to ask for roll a way bed was told we got the last roll a way bed. asked if enough room for it without tripping over each other & was told probably not so we up grated to what was suppost to be a over sized room we paid over 200.00 and something for the 2 nights but at least we all will be comfortable was suppost to have 2 queen beds a sofa bed which she said would have a good bed inside of it this way we wouldnt need the roll away, ho yah she told me we got the last handicapped room also. checked in went to room and there was a roll a way in the room which we saw through the window. meaning we couldnt get in the room the door was warped and the card wouldnt let us enter. had to go back to the front desk twice, finally got into the room opened up the hide a bed and the bed had a huge sink hole in the middle of it, opened up the roll away again a big sink hole in the middle of it now mind you we had got the last handicapped room so didnt go back to office as we needed the handicapped bathroom. so put the roll away mattress on top of the sofa bed and still had to sleep in a sink hole, very very uncomfortable. shower curtain was so dirty so had to go and buy a shower curtian liner we didnt trust them to give us a fresh one since the one in there was a dirty one to begin with. the sink area they had a portable closet in there and we couldnt curl our hair the opening between the closet and the wall wasnt wide enough to hold up both of my arms to curl our hair, very very cramped. the pillows were so soft that when you layed your head on them it was like no pollow was there. very noisy it seemed like a roughty area everyone that pulled up in the cars or suv's had the misic blairing clear up to 3am, didnt get much sleep, could hear the people clomping up and down the stairs at all hours of the night since the stairs were between us and the next room. i will never stay there again!! they say they have breakfast but you have to wait to get a table to sit at and hardly have nothing out to eat, all 3 girls were in the back chatting with one another. the fruit was old and wrinklie, syrup was almost empty, again no where to sit and signs saying no food in the rooms so had to go back and forth 3 times to finally get a place to sit and then only ate a waffle because like i said the fruit was old and wrinklie, the danishes were stale and dry, horrible place i would never recomind it to any one i liked and its really a shame because we stay at choice hotels alot this year alone 12 times not counting another hotel we love to stay out (different chain). we dont mind paying more because the ones we have stayed at before were always comfie beds, good fresh food, clean rooms and you can always take the food back to your room if you choose to we went out and bought our own trays we carry with us we stay at choice hotels everytime we travel if at all possible but this one is a thumbs down and like i said stay clear its a dump and way way over priced. we could of stayed at a motel 6 and went to breakfast for a whole lot cheaper and be alot more comfortable and felt alot safer than we did. horrible time and especially at christmas time shame on you comfort inn near pasadena in eagle rock!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Staff”
Reviews.Author: Stevo442
Reviews.Content: The staff is great, room is good and location is ok.

Reviews.Title: “Always Friendly”
Reviews.Author: Brainsbull
Reviews.Content: My husband and I frequent this hotel because of the friendly staff and great service. There is a wide variety of quality breakfast items included in the free breakfast and the hotel is convenietnly located for easy shopping and dinning.

Reviews.Title: “Good value hotel, convenient to valley and downtown”
Reviews.Author: juicy2009
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel several times because it is close to family and friends in LA but is also a very clean and safe hotel at a good price. It is only about 20 mins to Burbank airport, 10 min to Pasadena, 15 mins to Chinatown/downtown plus you get a free breakfast and parking is free. Eagle Rock is a somewhat secluded and unknown part of LA but it's safe and has everything you need close by with less traffic. I always consider this hotel when I need to be in the Glendale/Pasadena area.

Reviews.Title: “simple, nice, easy, hotel”
Reviews.Author: laandback
Reviews.Content: freeway close, easy to find places to eat, nice staff,

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay for a weekend get away and more!”
Reviews.Author: crodrigu
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend I stood here so we could get away for the weekend. It was the perfect stay. The hotel staff is super nice and the rooms are super clean! Plus, you can't go wrong with free wireless internet when most hotels make you cough up at least $10 a day for their wireless. We will definitely be staying here again :] If you're in the Pasadena, Eagle Rock, Glendale area visiting I would definitely recommend staying here because I know we will, again.

Reviews.Title: “"My second home"”
Reviews.Author: afford
Reviews.Content: Whenever i come to Eagle Rock, CA (which i do quite often) to visit my young children i stay at the Comfort Inn. Thay are always friendly and charming and i nearly never have a problem booking the room.Â  They have a laundry room which i find helpful. I'm a little too bohemian to arise for their continental breakfast (6 to 9 AM) but i imagine most folks in the jet set business world find that just right. Avoid the smoking rooms, they are a bit saturated even if you smoke.

Reviews.Title: “Best value for short notice”
Reviews.Author: Roberto503
Reviews.Content: My travels for work takes me everywhere in the lower 48 states. This Comfort Inn by far rates in the top choices for Los Angeles and southern Calif. Location is ideal, Dodger stadiem, Hollywood, China Town, and "The Valley" are minutes away. Food on just about every corner and a mall just off CA 2. The staff is always willing to help if a problem arises and gives directions. Rooms are very clean.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable”
Reviews.Author: netskibruhaha
Reviews.Content: i spent the evening here to visit a friend and it was nice! I recommend this for a quick overnite! the sheets are clean and the people friendly! :-D

HotelInfo.Name: Comfort Inn Near Old Town Pasadena - Eagle Rock
HotelInfo.Address: 2300 Colorado Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90041
